## canvasPixels() function

Accepts either an existing canvas or creates a new one of given size. Returns object of canvas, 2d context, img data and wrapped img data as u32 ABGR pixel array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function canvasPixels(canvas: HTMLCanvasElement): RawPixelBuffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  canvas | <code>HTMLCanvasElement</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RawPixelBuffer`
